title: EngiyE vADuden (padam)
sahitya:
EngiyE vADuden uLLam sakhiyE EngiyE vAduden uLLam


anupallavi

  mangai en manam ingidamAik-kavarnda shen kamalak-kaNNan tannai AdaiyavE


caraNam    mazhai mugilO vanna maNiyO kaDalO avan muruval pUtta pudu malarO
 maruvi avan tan madhura idazhamudam parugi nigarilAp-pErinbam aDaindiDa
